posts.post_content: Murray is miscut on the back and has a bit of a WST you can see on the right border.  $55 for Murray. Paypal gift please

AB is sold, Murray still available. Nice price for a card showing parts of two backs in that condition. Price includes shipping! 

Plus there is a little bit of a wet sheet transfer there. It's a poor man's freak card :)

I'm going to the post office tomorrow, so let me know what you want to pay for the Murray. Cheap way to get a decent looking card with part of a second back showing. It's $55 or BO now, which means I'll take less than $55
